data.name: Arcanist Online
data.detailed_description:
Click on the link below to join us on discord! Be the first to hear all up-to-date news on Arcanist, engage in our community, and join closed alpha!
https://discord.gg/59Hm9YscQ9



Arcanist is a 2D MMORPG that takes you into a dark medieval fantasy world that has outlawed magic from the 3 kingdoms. After being initiated into the Arcanist Brotherhood you must make your mark in its ever-changing world. Will you prove to society there is still a place for magic and goodwill to coexist? Or will you use your knowledge of the arcane to spread chaos and manipulate your world for your own material gains? The choice is yours young arcanist.




Exploring the open world of Arcanist is an experience in itself! The dramatic atmosphere and a huge open world that has been overtaken by chaos and darkness really do a lot of the storing telling for Arcanist. The lore and dialogues are rich and complex with every encounter adding some meaning and backstory to the game. Be careful how you choose your words, making many decisions in the game will affect your encounters moving forward so make sure you think things through. Quests will pull you into many of the dramas and characters of the world, leaving you with a sense of a living and breathing world.




2,000 years ago the demons were banished into Demonica by King Atoil and his army of knights. But were they? A group of Arcanists is working night and day to raise these demons from Demonica to strike fear amongst the population. A Demon must follow the laws of our dimension and can only be killed in our realm, once killed they can never return. Demons may rematerialize infinitely in Demonica but not above ground. Will you work against the Chaotic arcanists to summon the Demons and put them to rest for good or aid in their efforts?

data.short_description: Arcanist is a dark medieval fantasy 2D MMORPG where magic is outlawed from the kingdoms. After being initiated into the Arcanist Brotherhood you may prove there is still a good place for magic or spread chaos and manipulate the world for material gains. The choice is yours young arcanist.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+ (.Net Framework 4.6.2), OSX 10.10+ (w/Mono), Various Linux Distros (w/Mono)
  • Processor: Intel i3 or Better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (.Net Framework 4.6.2), OSX 10.10+ (w/Mono), Various Linux Distros (w/Mono)
  • Processor: Intel i3 or Better
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A

content_descriptors.notes: Plague Masters contains graphical depictions of murder, blood nudity and violence.
